name: BetterBody Foods Organic Cacao Powder, Rich Chocolate Flavor, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Cocoa, 16 ounce, 1 lb bag
short_description: LESS FAT & FEWER CALORIES: Chocolate is a staple in most households, but it can make people feel guilty because it is often associated with candy and sugary treats. Our Organic Cacao Powder provides you with a better-for-you alternative to regular chocolate. Our chocolate has the same great flavor as ordinary cocoa with the added benefits of organic cacao and less guilt

BEST TASTING CACAO POWDER: Who doesn’t love indulging in a chocolate treat every once in a while. Our Organic Cacao Powder may seem like an unlikely contender when compared to the powdered cocoa you’re used to, but think again. It can be used as a substitute for ordinary chocolate powder in nearly any dish. It is the smart way to get your chocolate fix

ORGANIC CHOCOLATE: Our Organic Cacao Powder can give you a boost of nutrients in each serving. This cacao powder is a great addition to any post-workout routine and can be used alongside the protein powder that you already use. This product comes in a 16 oz. bag and is USDA organic, non-GMO, and kosher certified. Oh, and it's also gluten-free

Simple Ingredients: We made Organic Cacao Powder with one simple ingredient—organic cacao from Peru. No more confusing labels or hard-to-pronounce ingredients. With our cacao powder, you're getting the real deal and nothing else!

BLEND, BAKE, OR SHAKE: Kick cocoa to the curb and try cooking and baking with our Organic Cacao Powder. Mix into baked goods like bread, pancakes, waffles, cakes, and cookies to add a great chocolatey flavor. You can also blend it into breakfast smoothies and other tasty drinks. Great for men and women who are chocolate lovers. The possibilities are endless
product_description: Finding better alternatives to common foods can be helpful for people who are trying to change their diet and live a better life. Instead of using ordinary cocoa powder, switch over to BetterBody Foods Organic Cacao Powder! With no additives, you’ll get the same great flavor as cocoa but without the guilt! Chocolate has never tasted so good! BetterBody Foods Cacao is a great addition to breakfast smoothies and shakes because it is a superfood that is loaded with helpful nutrients, vitamins, and antioxidants. Our organic cacao powder is not only great in shakes and smoothies, but it can be used in a variety of baked goods. Use it in bread, cookies, muffins, cupcakes, pancakes, and waffles for a flavorful kick that your entire family will love! You can also use it to make hot chocolate beverages and classic Mexican mole sauce. The possibilities are endless! Unlike many other foods that have ingredients that you can’t even pronounce, our BetterBody Foods cacao contains 1 simple ingredient: organic, cacao. With chocolate this pure, you'll never go back to ordinary cocoa. This cacao powder is the perfect new addition to your pantry. BetterBody Foods is determined to bring you quality foods that are better for your body without sacrificing the flavors that you enjoy. Don't just take our word for it; try some for yourself today!

name: Organic Cacao Powder, Unsweetened, 1 lb (454 g) – Rich Dark Chocolate Flavor, Perfect for Baking, Smoothies & Hot Chocolate – Vegan, Keto, Paleo, Non-GMO & Gluten-Free Cocoa Powder
short_description: ORGANIC CACAO POWDER - Experience decadent, rich, dark chocolatey goodness with our pure, organic cacao powder. The aroma of rich dark chocolate not only tantalizes your senses but also delivers a guilt-free indulgence, crafted with no added sugar.

BLENDS EASILY IN SMOOTHIES & HOT CHOCOLATE - Gently milled into a fine, silky powder without clumps or grittiness, our unsweetened cacao powder is an easy and delicious addition to your morning smoothie, shake, yogurt, oatmeal - you name it.

THE IDEAL BAKING SUBSTITUTE - If you’re looking for an organic alternative to dark chocolate or cocoa powder, swap our cacao powder organic 1:1 for traditional organic cocoa powder in all your favorite cakes and cookie recipes.
KETO, PALEO, VEGAN & GLUTEN FREE - Not only is our pure cocoa powder unsweetened, it is non-alkalized, gluten-free, Keto and Paleo, dairy-free, and kosher - a must-have kitchen staple.

QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST - Forget fillers and additives. Viva Naturals cacao powder is USDA-certified organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, and contains just one ingredient: organic dark cacao powder ground from the cacao beans of the Theobroma cacao tree.

short_description: Organic Cacao Powder Made from high quality, carefully selected cacao beans. Our cacao powder provides numerous benefits, is not alkalized, and has no added sugars, fillers, or binders. Grown in Peru

Be Elevated. From bean to bliss, our Cacao powder is organically crafted and made from high quality carefully selected cacao beans to elevate your recipes to rich decadence. Elevates Mood, Increases Energy with 15 mg caffeine per serving, Provides flavor satisfaction, 1:1 substitute for cocoa, Boosts Antioxidants
